meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>bitter</kanji> <kanji>valley</kanji> is a place known as <vocabulary>Shibuya</vocabulary>. This is a very famous area in Tokyo. Very busy too.
readingMnemonic: The reading of 渋 comes from 渋い. The reading for 谷 is an exception. Just think about someone asking you if  <vocabulary>Shibuya</vocabulary> is cool. Your answer of course is "<reading>yah</reading>." (や)
